Function fclose

system.posix fclose (file )

Closes the given file object.

Function fopen

system.posix fopen (path, mode )

Opens the file at the given path using the given mode. This returns a file object, that you should not forget to close.

 var fd = fopen("/tmp/myfile.txt", "w")

Function time

system.posix time ( )

Returns the local UNIX time as an integer, in milliseconds

Function fopen

system.posix fopen (path, mode )

Opens the file at the given path using the given mode. This returns a file object, that you should not forget to close.

 var fd = fopen("/tmp/myfile.txt", "w")
